Package com.atakmap.map.opengl

Class GLOffscreenVertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.map.opengl.GLOffscreenVertex
  • @Deprecated
@DeprecatedApi(since="5.3",
               forRemoval=true,
               removeAt="5.6")
public class GLOffscreenVertex
extends java.lang.Object
    Deprecated.
    to be removed without replacement
    This is a simple structure used by the GLMapView to represent a vertex in the offscreen surface for rendering

    • Field Summary

      Deprecated.

      int geoVersion
      Deprecated.
      This value tells the version of the of the geo point which needs to be incremented every time it changes.
      PointD proj
      Deprecated.
      This point is used to store the projection for the geo point
      int projVersion
      Deprecated.
      This value tells the version of the projection which helps to detect when it is not in sync with the geoVersion

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void adjust()
      Deprecated.
      When called this will use the altitude value stored in the geo and then if it is valid it will update the altitude value in the altitudeAdjustedGeo after applying the elevation offset and scale value.

      Deprecated.
      This will take the array of vertices and compute an offset value by using taking an average of all the vertices with a valid elevation set

    • Field Detail

      • geo

        public final GeoPoint geo
        Deprecated.
        This is the geo point that defines the location of the vertex on the map

      • altitudeAdjustedGeo

        public final GeoPoint altitudeAdjustedGeo
        Deprecated.

      • proj

        public final PointD proj
        Deprecated.
        This point is used to store the projection for the geo point

      • geoVersion

        public int geoVersion
        Deprecated.
        This value tells the version of the of the geo point which needs to be incremented every time it changes. It is also the base version that the projVersion and altVersion try to match

      • projVersion

        public int projVersion
        Deprecated.
        This value tells the version of the projection which helps to detect when it is not in sync with the geoVersion

      • altVersion

        public int altVersion
        Deprecated.
        This value tells the version of the altitude which helps to detect when it is not in sync with the geoVersion

    • Method Detail

      • adjust

        public void adjust()
        Deprecated.
        When called this will use the altitude value stored in the geo and then if it is valid it will update the altitude value in the altitudeAdjustedGeo after applying the elevation offset and scale value.

      • computeElevationStatistics

        public static void computeElevationStatistics​(GLOffscreenVertex[] vertices,
                                              int offset,
                                              int count,
                                              Statistics stats)
        Deprecated.
        This will take the array of vertices and compute an offset value by using taking an average of all the vertices with a valid elevation set
        Parameters:
        vertices - The vertices to compute the elevation offset for
        count - The number of vertices in the array to include so going from [0, count)
